name: Drone Shooter
description:
Hello, 

This is my first game coded with Lua. It's pretty simple but it's a start

To play, you just have to press de right or left arrow to move and press space to shoot a projectile. Every time you hit the snake, his speed is increased. If you miss 3 shots, the game reset.

If you have any suggestion or else, don't hesitate to let me know !

Hope you enjoy the small game !
